forWho.que: Is this online Python training course for beginners?
forWho.ans:
Yes, this free python course starts from scratch, and any newbie can learn easily.
Python is the most popular programming language on the planet. It has quickly become a preferred language for everything from desktop apps, web development to Data Science and Machine Learning. Although anyone can learn Python and carve his/her career, here are the kind of professionals / beginners who can easily go for this free Python course:
  • Machine Learning, AI professionals
  • Software developers, Testers, Leads and architects
  • Data Science aspirants
  • Freshers / Graduates focusing to build a rock solid career

faq.que: How will you help me if I miss any Hadoop training session?
faq.ans: If you miss any session, you need not worry as recordings will be uploaded in LMS immediately as the session gets over. You can go through it and get your queries cleared from the instructor during next session. You can also ask him to explain the concepts that you did not understand and were covered in session you missed. Alternatively you can attend the missed session in any other batch running parallely.

faq.que: How will I perform the Big Data Hadoop practicals at home??
faq.ans: Instructor will help you in setting virtual machine on your own system at which you can do practicals anytime from anywhere. Manual to set virtual machine will be available in your LMS in case you want to go through the steps again. Virtual machine can be set on MAC or Windows machine also.

faq.que: How long will the Hadoop course recording be available?
faq.ans: All the Hadoop training sessions will be recorded and you will have lifetime access to the recordings along with the complete Hadoop study material, POCs, Hadoop project etc.

faq.que: What things do I need to attend the online classes?
faq.ans: To attend online Hadoop training, you just need a laptop or PC with a good internet connection of around 1 MBPS (But the lesser speed of 512 KBPS will also work). The broadband connection is recommended but you can connect through data card as well.

faq.que: How do I clear my doubts after a class?
faq.ans: If you have any doubts during sessions, you can clear it with the instructor immediately. If you get queries after the session, you can get it cleared from the instructor in the next session as before starting any session, instructor spends around 15 minutes in doubt clearing. Post training, you can post your query over discussion forum and our support team will assist you. Still if you are not comfortable, you can drop mail to instructor or directly interact with him.

faq.que: What are the system specifications required to learn Hadoop?
faq.ans: Recommended is a minimum of an i3 processor, a 20 GB disk, and 4 GB RAM in order to learn Hadoop, although students have learnt Hadoop on 2 GB RAM as well.

faq.que: How will this Hadoop course help me in getting a Big Data job?
faq.ans: Our training includes multiple workshops, POCs and projects. Those will prepare you to a level where you can start working from day 1 wherever you go. You will be assisted in resume preparation. The mock interviews will help you get ready to face real interviews. We will also guide you with job openings matching your resume. These things will help you get your dream Big Data job in the industry.

faq.que: What will the end result be of this Hadoop online course?
faq.ans: You will be skilled with practical and theoretical knowledge that the industry looks for and will become a certified Hadoop professional who is ready to take on Big Data Projects in top organizations.

faq.que: Where do DataFlair students come from?
faq.ans: DataFlair has blend of students from across the globe. Apart from India, we provide Hadoop training in the US, UK, Singapore, Canada, UAE, France, Brazil, Ireland, Indonesia, Japan, Sri Lanka, etc to cover the complete globe.

faq.que: How will I be able to interact with the instructor during the training?
faq.ans: Both voice and chat will be enabled during the Big Data Hadoop training sessions. You can talk with the instructor or can also interact via chatting.

faq.que: Is this Hadoop training classroom-based or online?
faq.ans: This is completely online training with a batch size of 10-12 students only. You will be able to interact with trainer through voice or chat and individual attention will be provided to all. The trainer ensures that every student is clear of all the concepts taught before proceeding ahead. So there will be complete environment of classroom learning.

faq.que: Will you provide any Hadoop certification after the training?
faq.ans: Yes, you will be provided DataFlair Certification. At the end of this course, you will work on a real time Project. Once you are successfully through the project, you will be awarded a certificate.

faq.que: How do I get in touch with you for further queries?
faq.ans: You can feel free to contact us by placing a CALL at +91 8451097879 OR dropping your queries on our email at info@data-flair.training

faq.que: Why should I learn Hadoop?
faq.ans: Big data is the latest and the most demanding technology with continuously increasing demand in the Indian market and abroad. Hadoop professionals are among the highest paid IT professionals today with salary $135k (source: indeed job portal). You can check our blog related to Why should I learn Big Data?

faq.que: What type of projects I will be doing during the training?
faq.ans: You will be doing real-time Hadoop projects in different domains like retail, banking, and finance, etc. using different technologies like Hadoop HDFS, MapReduce, Apache Pig, Apache Hive, Apache HBase, Apache Oozie, Apache Flume and Apache Sqoop.

faq.que: Do you provide placement assistance?
faq.ans: The Hadoop course from DataFlair is 100% job oriented that will prepare you completely for interview and Big Data job perspective. Post Big Data course completion, we will provide you assistance in resume preparation and tips to clear Hadoop interviews. We will also let you know for Hadoop jobs across the globe matching your resume.

faq.que: Can I attend a demo session before enrolling for this Hadoop course?
faq.ans: Yes, you can attend the Hadoop demo class recording on our Big data Hadoop course page itself to understand the quality and level of Big Data training we provide and that creates the difference between DataFlair and other Hadoop online training providers.

faq.que: Can you guide me about the career aspects of Big Data hadoop developers?
faq.ans: Hadoop is one of the hottest career options available today for all the software engineers to boost their professional career. In the US itself there are approximately 12,000 jobs currently for Hadoop developers and demand for Hadoop developers are increasing day by day rapidly far more than the availability.

curriculum.title: Statistics and Mathematics for Machine Learning
content: Introduction to Probability, Conditional probability, Bayes theorem

curriculum.title: Data Visualization, Analysis & Manipulation
content: Data visualization using matplotlib and seaborn
Concatenation, Join, Aggregation, Merging, GroupBy using Pandast
Reading and Writing data from Excel/CSV formats into Pandas

curriculum.title: Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
Tensorflow and ANN
content: Introduction to TensorFlow, Architecture & Operations on Tensorflow
Loss Functions like Cross-entropy loss, MSE etcs

curriculum.title: Conversational AI
content: NLP – Natural Language processing using RNN

features.title: Lifetime access to course with support
Discussion forum for queries and interaction

forWho.que: Is this free online Machine Learning course for beginners (like me)?
forWho.ans:
This course will help you with your basic understanding of Machine Learning topics. The curated course will be beneficial for you in establishing a strong foundation to ensure an even stronger future hold on the topics. While anyone can benefit from it in their career, here are the kind of professionals / beginners who should go for this Free Machine Learning Course:
  • Software developers, project managers, and architects
  • BI, ETL and Data Warehousing professionals
  • Web developers, Mobile app developers
  • Freshers / Graduates focusing to build a rock solid career

companies.title: Companies you can expect when you get Python-certified with us

faq.que: Is the ML course free or is it paid?
faq.ans: This course offered by Dataflair is a free course. Even C Certification is also Free.

faq.que: How long will the course recordings be available?
faq.ans: Once enrolled, the  course materials can be accessed for a lifetime. All the sessions, material, Codes, and projects will be available forever.

faq.que: What do I need in order to take this  course?
faq.ans: To attend this  course, you need to have a laptop or PC with a good internet connection. An elementary machine with 4 GB RAM is enough for the practicals.

faq.que: How do I clear my ML related queries?
faq.ans: You can post your queries/doubts/issues in the comment section of video or study material. The instructor will answer your questions.

faq.que: What are the system specifications required?
faq.ans: Any basic  / elementary PC is sufficient to learn C, it is recommended to have minimum of an i3 processor (or dual core), a 20 GB disk, and 4 GB RAM for installing and practising C.

faq.que: What will be the end result of this Free online  course?
faq.ans: At the end of the course, you will greatly understand  ML algorithms. This knowledge will help you get placed in a job of your choice.

faq.que: Where do all the students come from?
faq.ans: DataFlair has blend of students from across the globe. Apart from India, we provide training in the US, the UK, Singapore, Canada, UAE, France, Brazil, Ireland, Indonesia, Japan, Sri Lanka, and many others covering the globe.

faq.que: Is this Course for Beginners?
faq.ans: This Free  course covers all the topics from basics to advanced level..

faq.que: Where do DataFlair students come from?
faq.ans: DataFlair has blend of students from across the globe. Apart from India, we provide Hadoop training in the US, UK, Singapore, Canada, UAE, France, Brazil, Ireland, Indonesia, Japan, Sri Lanka, etc to cover the complete globe.

faq.que: How will I be able to interact with the instructor during the training?
faq.ans: Both voice and chat will be enabled during the Big Data Hadoop training sessions. You can talk with the instructor or can also interact via chatting.

faq.que: Is this Free ML training classroom-based or online?
faq.ans: This free training program on ML is entirely online and self-paced. You need not to travel anywhere rather learn c programming from the comfort of your home.

faq.que: Will I get any certificate at the end of this course?
faq.ans: Yes, we will provide an industry-recognized  certificate declaring your proficiency. You will work on real-time  projects at the end of this free course.

faq.que: How will this Machine Learning course be beneficial to me?
faq.ans: This Machine Learning course will provide you with all the basics that you will require for a hassle-free Machine Learning industry experience. It will teach you the basics as well as the complex topics of Machine Learning with ease. Apart from this, you will also gain practical knowledge for deploying Machine Learning models with the help of live Machine Learning projects.

faq.que: How do I get in touch with you for further queries?
faq.ans: You are free to contact us by dropping a mail to info@data-flair.training

faq.que: I am a complete beginner at Machine Learning. Will that become a problem while doing this ML course?
faq.ans: Not at all. This Machine Learning course aims at making basic Machine Learning topics accessible to beginners. This course is curated in such a way that you will not have to worry about any prerequisites and enjoy your journey of attaining thorough knowledge and expertise in Machine Learning.

faq.que: What type projects will I be doing during the training?
faq.ans: You will be doing real life projects in different domains

faq.que: Do you provide placement assistance?
faq.ans: This course from DataFlair is 100% job-oriented and will prepare you entirely for interviews for top product companies

enroll: 5+ Real-time ML projects with implementation
170+ hrs of study material, practicals, quizzes
Practice oriented course with live case-studies to gain hands-on expertise
Lifetime access with industry renowned certification
learn: Lifetime access with industry renowned certification
Kickstart your career with a rock-strong foundation
Build a strong foundation in Big Data, Hadoop & Spark
Understand how Big Data helps in real-time applications
Understand data manipulation along with visualization
Work on standard industry use-cases and live projects
Learn to apply knowledge gained to build optimized code
Learn complex concepts
Become adept in the latest version of Apache Hadoop
Develop a complex game-changing MapReduce application
Master the Hadoop ecosystem components
Grasp the concepts of Apache Spark and its components

why.title: The Hadoop market will reach almost $99B by 2022 at the CAGR of around 42%
More than 77% of organizations consider Big Data a top priority
TThe average salary of all Hadoop developers today is the amount of $135k
The world’s most valuable resource is Big Data, no longer oil.

prerequisite.que: What to do before you begin your Free online training?
prerequisite.suggest: All you need to make the most out of this free course is a desire to learn and a penchant for solving real-world problems

curriculum.title: The big picture of Big Data
content: Necessity of Big Data and Hadoop in the industry
Paradigm shift - why the industry is shifting to Big Data tools
Data explosion in the Big Data industry

curriculum.title: Demystifying Hadoop
content: Why Hadoop is at the heart of every Big Data solution
Introduction to the Big Data Hadoop framework

curriculum.title: Setup and Installation of Hadoop
content: SETUP AND INSTALLATION OF SINGLE-NODE HADOOP CLUSTER
SETUP AND INSTALLATION OF HADOOP MULTI-NODE CLUSTER

curriculum.title: HDFS – The Storage Layer
content: What is HDFS (Hadoop Distributed File System)
HDFS data flow and storage mechanism
Hadoop HDFS characteristics and design principles

curriculum.title: A Deep Dive into MapReduce
content: What is MapReduce, the processing layer of Hadoop
The need for a distributed processing framework
Issues before MapReduce and its evolution
Components of MapReduce – Mapper and Reducer
MapReduce terminologies- keys, values, lists, and more

curriculum.title: MapReduce - Advanced Concepts
content: Developing custom data types using Writable & WritableComparable

curriculum.title: Hive – Data Analysis Tool
content: The need for an adhoc SQL based solution – Apache Hive
Introduction to and architecture of Hadoop Hive
Playing with the Hive shell and running HQL queries

curriculum.title: Pig - Data Analysis Tool
content: The need for a high level query language - Apache Pig
How Pig complements Hadoop with a scripting language
Different Pig operations like filter and join

curriculum.title: NoSQL Database - HBase
content: NoSQL databases and their need in the industry
The HBase Master and Slave Model

curriculum.title: Data Collection using Sqoop
content: Importing data from RDBMS to HDFS
Exporting data to RDBMS from HDFS

curriculum.title: Data Collection using Flume
content: Understanding Flume components like data Sources and Sinks

curriculum.title: . Exploring Scala
content: Developing, debugging, and running basic Scala programs

curriculum.title: Real Life Hadoop & Spark Project
content: Multiple real-time Java capstone projects based on industry use cases and requirements to master the Java language.

overview: DataFlair’s Free Kafka Training will give you a perfect blend of in-depth Kafka theoretical knowledge and strong practical skills. This Kafka certification training course introduces real-time Kafka projects to give you a headstart in learning Kafka and enables you to bag top Kafka jobs in the industry.

enroll: 5+ Real-time projects with implementation
170+ hrs of study material, practicals, quizzes
Practice oriented course with live case-studies to gain hands-on expertise
Lifetime access with industry renowned certification
learn: Lifetime access with industry renowned certification
Kickstart your career with a rock-strong foundation
Build a strong foundation in Apache Spark
Perform different operations on topics
Understand data manipulation along with visualization
Work on standard industry use-cases and live projects
Learn to apply knowledge gained to build optimized code
Learn complex concepts
Become adept in the latest version of Apache kafka
Learn concepts of the latest version of Kafka
Develop real-time Kafka applications
Learn Zookeeper and its installation

why.title: Next-gen messaging queue, mandatory component for all real-time Big Data project
Linkedin, Uber, Airbnb, and other 1000s of companies are using Kafka.
Kafka revolutionizes Big Data, whose market will reach $99B in next 2 yrs.
Average Salary of Kafka Professional is 122,000 USD per annum.

prerequisite.que: What to do before you begin your Free online training?
prerequisite.suggest: All you need to make the most out of this free course is a desire to learn and a penchant for solving real-world problems

curriculum.title: A Deep Dive into the Kafka Architecture
content: Internals of architecture and core concepts
Kafka components - Broker, Producer, Consumer, Topics, Partitions

curriculum.title: Understanding Brokers
content: Multiple brokers on a single machine

curriculum.title: Understanding Producers
content: Producer partition- Custom, Round Robin, Field-Based Partition
Sync and async producer hands on

curriculum.title: Understanding Consumers
content: Consumer queuing, consumer groups, and consumer broadcast

curriculum.title: Topics and Partitions
content: Working with topics and updating them
Using Partitions and distribution of partitions

curriculum.title: Replication in Kafka
content: High availability and reliability using replication

curriculum.title: Installation of Kafka
content: Deploying Apache Kafka on single node cluster
Deploying Apache Kafka on multi-node cluster

curriculum.title: Kafka Advanced Operations - Part 1
content: Working with multiple topics for different type of data
Developing applications using high and low level APIs
Different types of consumers high level & low level

curriculum.title: Kafka Advanced Operations - Part 2
content: Monitoring and management of Kafka Cluster
JMX Monitor and Kafka administration tools

curriculum.title: Real-life Kafka Project
content: Live Kafka project based on industry use-cases to solve real world problems

forWho.ans:

  • Software engineers, leads, and architects

  • Big Data professionals willing to accelerate their career as Kafka developer
